useEffect(()=>{if(content!==editorContent){setEditorContent(content);setHasChanges(false);}},[content,editorContent]);// Handle content changes

setTimeout(()=>{textarea.selectionStart=textarea.selectionEnd=start+spaces.length;},0);}};// Auto-resize textarea
